actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to enable the United States to render assistance to or in behalf of certain migrants and refugees.
short_title: Indochina Migration and Refugee Assistance Act

summary.text: Indochina Migration and Refugee Assistance Act - Authorizes to be appropriated sums as are necessary to assist aliens who: (1) because of persecution on account of race, religion, or political opinion, fled from Cambodia or Vietnam; (2) cannot return there because of fear of persecution on account of race, religion, or political opinion; and (3) are in urgent need of assistance for the essentials of life. Provides that none of such funds shall be available for obligation for any purpose after September 30, 1977.

titles.title: Indochina Migration and Refugee Assistance Act
A bill to enable the United States to render assistance to or in behalf of certain migrants and refugees.
